name: Shimano SLX CS-M7000 11 Speed 11-42T Cassette
description: An 11-speed cassette that blends performance and affordability. The SLX series really benefits from trickledown tech of pricier lines.42T cog is made of aluminum while the others are made of steel.Aluminum spider keeps the weight low.Compatible with HG-X 11-speed chains.11-13-15-17-19-21-24-28-32-37-42T.
